subject: Football
lead_paragraph: As a lingering knee injury turned Robert Griffin III into Robert Griffin one-and-a-half, Alfred Morris rushed for 200 yards and 3 touchdowns to help the Redskins clinch the N.F.C. East title.
snippet: As a lingering knee injury turned Robert Griffin III into Robert Griffin one-and-a-half, Alfred Morris rushed for 200 yards and 3 touchdowns to help the Redskins clinch the N.F.C. East title.
